Uses of Class
org.kitesdk.tools.TaskUtil.ConfigBuilder

    • Uses of TaskUtil.ConfigBuilder in org.kitesdk.tools

      Methods in org.kitesdk.tools that return TaskUtil.ConfigBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TaskUtil.ConfigBuilder TaskUtil.ConfigBuilder.addJarForClass(Class<?> requiredClass)
      Finds the jar that contains the required class and adds it to the distributed cache configuration.
      TaskUtil.ConfigBuilder TaskUtil.ConfigBuilder.addJarPathForClass(Class<?> requiredClass)
      Finds the jar that contains the required class and adds its containing directory to the distributed cache configuration.
      TaskUtil.ConfigBuilder TaskUtil.ConfigBuilder.addJars(List<String> jars)
      Adds a set of jar paths to the distributed cache.
      static TaskUtil.ConfigBuilder TaskUtil.configure(Configuration conf)
      Returns a configuration builder for the given Configuration.
      static TaskUtil.ConfigBuilder TaskUtil.configure(Job job)
      Returns a configuration builder for the given Job.
